overview: These films were made from The New York Times newspaper articles. The semi - automated animation process resulted in sentence recombinations that sometimes made sense while randomly emphasizing certain words and images.  Each computer animation was transferred to one 100ft roll of 16mm Tri-X reversal film and then hand-processed. The reversal negative is the original.
tagline: BOMB PARTS // BAGHDAD PLAN IS A SUCCESS // LOW PAY AND BROKEN PROMISES
title: Headlines: Hybrid Films
